title: Lane Bryant Logo
content:
Know what typeface is used in the Lane Bryant logo?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [CM Capture 1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141012170825/http:/typophile.com/files/CM%20Capture%201.jpg) | 12.36 KB |
author: julia.warren

comments.content: I wonder if this may be custom, given the size of the company and that it's being used in their identity. It looks like a combination of Futura Light and Engravers or Sackers Gothic.
